title: Capricorn and Cancer Compatibility: Experts Weigh In

steps.title: Capricorn and Cancer are opposites who attract.
steps.content: Capricorn and Cancer are opposites who attract. Earth sign Capricorn and water sign Cancer are very different on the surface, but they balance each other out. Capricorns bring security and stability to Cancers, who can sometimes be ruled by their intense emotions. At the same time, Cancers help reserved and practical Capricorns open up and embrace their more sensitive side. [1] X Research source Both of these signs also value loyalty and trust, which can help them build a lasting relationship . Since they do have some differences, they’ll have to be good at compromise . Luckily, both signs also share a desire to take care of the people they love, so they’re pretty good at adjusting things to make sure the other is happy.

steps.title: Both signs like to get to know each other before having sex.
steps.content: Both signs like to get to know each other before having sex. You won’t see a Cancer or a Capricorn rushing off to bed with someone they just met. Both of these signs like to take their time and build an emotional connection before making things physical, so they’re a great match for each other. Once they do slip between the sheets, these two signs have the potential for fireworks.

steps.title: Capricorns and Cancers can have great sexual chemistry.
steps.content: Capricorns and Cancers can have great sexual chemistry. Capricorns tend to take the lead, and Cancers often appreciate this. “When it comes to intimacy, Cancer is definitely on the shy and passive side and would like the partner to be the initiator,” explains astrologer Angel Eyedealism. [2] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 7 September 2022. Capricorns, on the other hand, tend to be on the more dominant side in all areas of their lives, including the bedroom. These complementary energies can be amazing for a Capricorn-Cancer pair!

steps.title: Capricorn may struggle with Cancer’s intense emotions.
steps.content: Capricorn may struggle with Cancer’s intense emotions. Ruled by the moon (the planet of emotions in astrology), it’s no surprise that Cancers are one of the most sensitive signs in the zodiac. On the other hand, Capricorns prefer to stick to the logical, rational side of things, and they’re less comfortable with strong emotion. “Capricorn is not generally a ‘mushy’ sign—they are more practical about the people they love,” explains astrologer Stina Garbis. [3] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Both partners will need to work together to find a way to better connect emotionally. It helps to learn each other’s love languages. Cancers tend to be very romantic, so they like to be physically affectionate and use terms of endearment. On the flip side, Capricorns tend to show love with material items and practical support. For example, since Capricorns love to feel helpful, it may be a good idea for a Cancer to ask their Capricorn partner for help when they're craving affection and connection, explains Garbis. [4] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. Reader Poll: We asked 278 wikiHow readers what small gift they, as Cancers, would be happiest to receive from someone they’re seeing, and 48% of them said a sweet note. [Take Poll] If you’re a Capricorn who struggles to express your emotions, try writing them down. A sentimental Cancer will likely appreciate it!

steps.title: Both signs want something serious, and they take their time to commit.
steps.content: Both signs want something serious, and they take their time to commit. Cancer is known as the mother of the zodiac, and Capricorn is known as the father of the zodiac. With this in mind, it makes sense that both of these signs are all about safety, security, and consistency in their emotional connections! They’re usually on the same page about taking their time to build a solid foundation together, and they both prefer serious romances, rather than casual flings. Because of this, Capricorn and Cancer can be a strong, long-lasting match!

steps.title: Capricorn and Cancer can struggle with their communication styles.
steps.content: Capricorn and Cancer can struggle with their communication styles. Both are Cardinal signs , which means they're each pushy in their own ways, explains Eyedealism. “Cancer is a Cardinal sign of the water elements, so they're pushy about emotional matters. They’ll just keep pushing until they get somebody [to talk about their emotions],” she says. [5] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. Wednesday, February 22, 2023. Capricorn, on the other hand, can be pushy in logical matters, but they tend to keep their emotions more bottled up. Ultimately, a Capricorn leads with their head, while a Cancer leads with their heart, which can cause some communication issues. Capricorn can support Cancer by being a good listener and having patience when Cancer is experiencing intense emotions. Oftentimes, a Capricorn will want to jump in with practical solutions and advice when a Cancer isn’t actually looking for these things; they just want to vent and express their emotions, and they’re looking for comfort and affirmation. Cancer, on the other hand, can help Capricorn by giving them space to process their emotions instead of pushing them to be an open book. Capricorns often prefer to work through their feelings internally before sharing them with others, but if they feel safe and secure enough with someone, they’ll eventually open up.

steps.title: Cancers can get their feelings hurt if Capricorn says the wrong thing.
steps.content: Cancers can get their feelings hurt if Capricorn says the wrong thing. Cancers are incredibly sensitive, and they often take things personally. And, since Capricorns can be overly logical and direct, they may accidentally say something hurtful without realizing it. Additionally, “Capricorn is ruled by Saturn. Saturn makes quick judgements and enjoys breaking it down for you [...] but this may come off as condescending, or talking down to you,” explains Garbis. [6] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. With all this in mind, being aware of each other’s communication style and forgiving of unintentional mistakes can help keep things harmonious. Since Capricorns care deeply about their partners, they won’t intentionally say something hurtful. If you’re a Cancer, it can do wonders to simply let your Capricorn partner know that their comment hurt your feelings. They’ll usually be careful not to make the same mistake again!

steps.title: Since both signs are loyal, they can trust each other.
steps.content: Since both signs are loyal, they can trust each other. Both Capricorn and Cancer are no-nonsense, honest signs, so they often feel safe and secure in each others’ presence. They both take their time to build trust in romantic relationships, but once they’ve judged the other person to be reliable and dependable, they’re ready to commit for life. It can be a bit of a slow build, but once they get there, a Cancer-Capricorn couple is one of the most solid pairings out there!

steps.title: Both Capricorn and Cancer value security and loyalty.
steps.content: Both Capricorn and Cancer value security and loyalty. Although they’re opposites in many ways, these two signs share the same core values. They crave a stable, comfortable home life and a solid relationship with someone they can trust completely. These shared values are an awesome foundation for a romantic relationship (or even a marriage!). [7] X Research source Since Capricorn and Cancer are often nicknamed the father and mother of the zodiac, they can sometimes slip into a more traditional relationship where Capricorn works to support the family, while Cancer nurtures the home. However, this isn’t always the case.

steps.title: Yes, Cancers and Capricorns can definitely be soulmates.
steps.content: Yes, Cancers and Capricorns can definitely be soulmates. Cancer and Capricorn are actually sister signs , which means they sit directly across from each other on the zodiac wheel. Sister signs tend to have some opposite traits that balance each other out, while also sharing deep similarities that create trust and connection between them. [8] X Research source The deep recognition and synergy between sister signs like Capricorn and Cancer can definitely be a strong foundation for a soulmate pairing.

steps.title: Capricorn women
steps.content: Capricorn women “A Capricorn lady is very practical and incredibly ambitious,” says Eyedealism. [9] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Because of this, Capricorn women are often looking for a partner who can match their hardworking, diligent energy. They want someone who will support them and cheer them on as they go after their goals, while also bringing impressive qualities of their own to the table, too. In other words, a Cap woman is looking for someone to be the other half of a power couple! To woo her: Be respectful, and don’t waste her time. “Capricorns are very [into] protocol. If a date showed up an hour late, they would not have sex with them. They'd be like, I'm so offended by your lack of protocol,” explains Eyedealism. [10] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 8 December 2021. Astrologist Tara Divina also recommends focusing on being reliable and direct about your feelings , rather than trying to win her over with sweeping romantic gestures. [11] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. “This is a person who is governed by the planet Saturn, which means they're going to value realness, authenticity, and directness, versus overly positive, overly Disney-fied romantic gestures [...] they're going to be a little more practical, as opposed to romantic and idealistic,” Divina says. [12] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.

steps.title: Capricorn men
steps.content: Capricorn men Like Capricorn women, Capricorn men are very practical and work-oriented. “He’s going to be ambitious and care deeply about his career, [so] giving him space to pursue his ambitions is important,” explains Divina. [13] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Additionally, a Capricorn man usually wants a partner who has their own ambitions, so that there’s a mutual understanding of the amount of time and effort they’ll each need to devote to their careers. To woo him: Be patient and don’t rush him into commitment. “Don’t expect him to move at your pace. Give him the time to move slowly and intentionally, in a structured way,” says Divina. [14] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. Divina also recommends showing him that you appreciate him for who he is. “Be a supportive force in his life, and don’t expect him to be something other than a Capricorn.” [15] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019. “Recognize that he has a Saturnian nature and may not be the guy that writes you a song or shows up at your house with 10 bouquets of flowers; he may have different ways of expressing his love,” Divina says. [16] X Expert Source Tara Divina Vedic Astrologer Expert Interview. 20 November 2019.

steps.title: Cancer women
steps.content: Cancer women Cancer women are some of the most caring people around, and they’re looking for a partner who’ll accept them completely, in all of their openhearted glory. “Let them take care of you. Go to them and ask for their help if you're sick or injured, or just ask for help in general—they love to emotionally support others,” says Garbis. [17] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022. In other words, if you want to date a Cancer woman, don’t fight her warmth and emotionality—embrace it! You may just find that you feel safer and more at home than ever before. To woo her: Garbis suggests bonding with cozy, heartwarming activities. “Cook together and eat meals with her. Bring appetizing desserts and sweets to enjoy together,” she says. [18] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022. Eyedealism also emphasizes the importance of being supportive, understanding, and trustworthy. “A Cancer tends to implode and become quiet and give the silent treatment when they feel that somebody is cheating or not being there for them,” she explains. [19] X Expert Source Angel Eyedealism Astrologer & Performance Artist Expert Interview. 7 September 2022.

steps.title: Cancer men
steps.content: Cancer men Like Cancer women, Cancer men are known for being deeply sensitive and affectionate, and they tend to be after true love, rather than hookups. If you do end up in a relationship with a Cancer man, “He is going to want to be close and to be helpful, and you should give him opportunities to be close to you,” says Garbis. [20] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022. For example, if you’re going through something in your personal life, consider reaching out to your Cancer man to talk things out. He’ll jump at the chance to be there for you and offer his emotional support! To woo him: Affirm his intense emotions and don’t push him to get over them too quickly. When a Cancer is feeling overwhelmed, sad, or anxious, they usually just need time to feel their feelings fully. “Give him space when he needs it, and know that he will come back around in a couple of days a new man,” recommends Garbis. [21] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 14 February 2022.

steps.title: Capricorns and Cancers can build lasting friendships together.
steps.content: Capricorns and Cancers can build lasting friendships together. Capricorn typically keeps a small inner circle of people who are important to them, explains Garbis. [22] X Expert Source Stina Garbis Psychic Astrologer Expert Interview. 10 December 2021. However, Capricorn usually senses that they can trust loyal and caring Cancers, which makes them a perfect addition to this circle. These pals also balance each other out. Hardworking Capricorn can help Cancer get organized to achieve their goals, and sensitive, intuitive Cancer can help Capricorn learn to be vulnerable and open up about their feelings. Capricorn also likes to be the friend who makes plans and takes the lead. This tends to pair well with Cancer, who’s very adaptable and appreciates Capricorn’s efforts.

steps.title: Capricorn and Cancer can create a lasting, stable relationship.
steps.content: Capricorn and Cancer can create a lasting, stable relationship. These opposites share a similar goal, and they commit for life. [23] X Research source If they can learn to compromise on their differences, they can have a beautiful future together. Typically, Capricorn won’t commit until they know their relationship is going to last. Cancer might need to be patient in the beginning while their partner learns to trust them.

steps.title: These signs might struggle most with communication.
steps.content: These signs might struggle most with communication. Capricorns don’t like expressing themselves and may struggle to open up. On the flip side, Cancers like to lay all their cards on the table and can get frustrated when their partner won’t do the same. It’s important that both partners learn how to best communicate with each other. Capricorns prefer for people to get right to the point. Cancer can learn to be more direct. On the other hand, Capricorns can be better listeners when Cancer needs to express how they feel.
